title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.9 - Location notice and equipment inventory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.9 - Location notice and equipment inventory

State Regulations

The owner or lessee of an amusement device, viewing stand
or tent shall provide a location notice and equipment inventory for each
device, stand or tent to be used in New York State. The location notice and
equipment inventory shall contain such information as deemed necessary by the
commissioner and shall be filed at least 10 working days before the intended
use of a device, stand or tent in New York State. No permit shall be issued to
an operator who has not filed a location notice and/or an equipment
inventory. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
